Author: goshheckdang
Text: Is the blood red? Like bright red? That could be from throat irritation (stomach acid is very, well... acidic. It eats at your esophagus, throat, and also your teeth). Not terribly worrisome, but if it continues it could erode your throat even more and cause bigger problems.  If the blood is dark red or black, def see a doctor! That could mean you have a serious internal bleed.
